---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

00101 - RS2
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.


LI R5 with 1000000000000000 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 1111111111111111 at index 1 - 001
LI R5 with 1000000000000000 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 1111111111111111 at index 3 - 011
LI R5 with 1000000000000000 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 1111111111111111 at index 5 - 101
LI R5 with 1000000000000000 at index 6 - 110
LI R5 with 1111111111111111 at index 7 - 111

00001 - RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.


LI R1 with 1100000000000000 at index 1 - 001
LI R1 with 1100000000000000 at index 3 - 011
LI R1 with 1100000000000000 at index 5 - 101
LI R1 with 1100000000000000 at index 7 - 111
 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1100001000001010000100000  

program

0000100000000000000000101  
0001111111111111111100101  
0010100000000000000000101  
0011111111111111111100101  
0100100000000000000000101  
0101111111111111111100101  
0110100000000000000000101  
0111111111111111111100101  
0001110000000000000000001  
0011110000000000000000001  
0101110000000000000000001  
0111110000000000000000001  
1100001000001010000100000  




passes.
